content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the command "write_to_file" to create a file named "river_restoration_summary.txt" and wrote a summary of the River Restoration Centre's Manual of River Restoration Techniques
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://www.engr.colostate.edu/~bbledsoe/CIVE413/Manual_of_River_Restoration_Techniques.htm", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_restoration", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "http://nwrm.eu/source/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://academic.oup.com/bioscience/article/60/3/209/257006", "https://www.gov.uk/flood-and-coastal-erosion-risk-management-research-reports/updating-the-river-restoration-centre-manual-of-restoration-techniques", "https://www.iowadnr.gov/Portals/idnr/uploads/RiverRestoration/toolbox/vegetative-restoration/Practice%202_Vegetative_Restoration_Full_Chapter.pdf"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "question": "What are some of the river restoration techniques mentioned on this website?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a website for the River Restoration Centre (RRC), which provides information on river restoration techniques. The RRC Manual of River Restoration Techniques offers detailed examples of innovative and best-practice river restoration techniques, including 68 case examples from 39 sites across the UK. The website also offers decision support pages to help identify relevant case studies and further advice on techniques. Techniques mentioned on the website include restoring meanders to straightened rivers, improving channel morphology, removing or bypassing barriers, and green bank protection.

Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques#main-content)', ' (https://www.therrc.co.uk/)', 'Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/theriverrestorationcentre)', 'Linkedin (http://www.linkedin.com/company/uk-river-restoration-centre-rrc-)', 'Twitter (http://twitter.com/The_RRC)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "river_restoration_techniques.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: discussing the evolution, challenges, and limitations of river restoration techniques in Europe, with a focus on maintaining ecological balance, increasing biodiversity, and improving water quality. The importance of considering natural processes and dynamic flow regimes is emphasized, and successful case studies are presented. The text also suggests a shift towards larger-scale projects and a focus on hyporheic processes, riparian zones, floodplains, and backwaters, and emphasizes the need for interdisciplinary approaches and post-project evaluation and monitoring. The greatest threats to progress are human population growth and climate change.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "river_restoration_summary.txt", "text": "discussing the evolution, challenges, and limitations of river restoration techniques in Europe, with a focus on maintaining ecological balance, increasing biodiversity, and improving water quality. The importance of considering natural processes and dynamic flow regimes is emphasized, and successful case studies are presented. The text also suggests a shift towards larger-scale projects and a focus on hyporheic processes, riparian zones, floodplains, and backwaters, and emphasizes the need for interdisciplinary approaches and post-project evaluation and monitoring. The greatest threats to progress are human population growth and climate change."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'river.txt', 'options.txt', 'new_file.txt', 'river_restoration_techniques.txt', 'river_restoration_summary.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/install_ffmpeg.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/create_river.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/river_drawing.py', 'Atlas/code_files/ai_code.py', 'Atlas/code_files/automate_task.py', 'Atlas/code_files/average.py', 'Atlas/code_files/test_average.py', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_features.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_info.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/pumble_pricing.txt', 'Atlas/misc_files/<filename>', 'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.json']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: File deleted successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "mkdir river_data"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "river.txt", "text": "\nI want to explore rivers in South America."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://www.engr.colostate.edu/~bbledsoe/CIVE413/Manual_of_River_Restoration_Techniques.htm", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_restoration", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "http://nwrm.eu/source/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://academic.oup.com/bioscience/article/60/3/209/257006", "https://www.gov.uk/flood-and-coastal-erosion-risk-management-research-reports/updating-the-river-restoration-centre-manual-of-restoration-techniques", "https://www.iowadnr.gov/Portals/idnr/uploads/RiverRestoration/toolbox/vegetative-restoration/Practice%202_Vegetative_Restoration_Full_Chapter.pdf"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "river_data"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command list_files returned: []', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "wget https://www.example.com/file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'--2023-06-13 21:54:12--  https://www.example.com/file.txt\nResolving www.example.com (www.example.com)... 93.184.216.34, 2606:2800:220:1:248:1893:25c8:1946\nConnecting to www.example.com (www.example.com)|93.184.216.34|:443... connected.\nHTTP request sent, awaiting response... 404 Not Found\n2023-06-13 21:54:13 ERROR 404: Not Found.\n\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "mkdir river_data"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b'mkdir: cannot create directory \xe2\x80\x98river_data\xe2\x80\x99: File exists\n'", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "git clone https://github.com/river_data.git"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:
b''
STDERR:
b"Cloning into 'river_data'...\nremote: Not Found\nfatal: repository 'https://github.com/river_data.git/' not found\n"', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "river restoration techniques"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://www.engr.colostate.edu/~bbledsoe/CIVE413/Manual_of_River_Restoration_Techniques.htm", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_restoration", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/topics/earth-and-planetary-sciences/river-restoration", "http://nwrm.eu/source/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "https://academic.oup.com/bioscience/article/60/3/209/257006", "https://www.gov.uk/flood-and-coastal-erosion-risk-management-research-reports/updating-the-river-restoration-centre-manual-of-restoration-techniques", "https://www.iowadnr.gov/Portals/idnr/uploads/RiverRestoration/toolbox/vegetative-restoration/Practice%202_Vegetative_Restoration_Full_Chapter.pdf"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "question": "What are the different techniques used for river restoration?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the River Restoration Centre's Manual of River Restoration Techniques, which aims to help river managers identify potential restoration techniques for use in river restoration and sustainable river management. The manual includes 68 case examples from 39 sites across the UK, and users can search by river name, restoration aim, or use an interactive map. The text also mentions that the RRC has the expertise to provide further advice on techniques, including those not yet included in the manual.

Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques#main-content)', ' (https://www.therrc.co.uk/)', 'Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/theriverrestorationcentre)', 'Linkedin (http://www.linkedin.com/company/uk-river-restoration-centre-rrc-)', 'Twitter (http://twitter.com/The_RRC)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques", "question": "What is the summary of the text on the website 'https://www.therrc.co.uk/manual-river-restoration-techniques'?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : a description of the River Restoration Centre's Manual of River Restoration Techniques, which provides guidance for river managers on potential restoration techniques for sustainable river management. The manual includes 68 case examples from 39 sites across the UK and can be searched by river name, restoration aim, or an interactive map. The RRC also offers further advice on techniques and project planning, delivery, and evaluation. The text includes decision support pages for restoring meanders, improving channel morphology, green bank protection, natural flood management, and creating floodplain wetland features. The manual is available for download as PDFs and is regularly updated.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "river_restoration_summary.txt", "text": "A summary of the River Restoration Centre's Manual of River Restoration Techniques, which provides guidance for river managers on potential restoration techniques for sustainable river management. The manual includes 68 case examples from 39 sites across the UK and can be searched by river name, restoration aim, or an interactive map. The RRC also offers further advice on techniques and project planning, delivery, and evaluation. The text includes decision support pages for restoring meanders, improving channel morphology, green bank protection, natural flood management, and creating floodplain wetland features. The manual is available for download as PDFs and is regularly updated."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'river.txt', 'options.txt', 'river_restoration_techniques.txt', 'river_restoration_summary.txt', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/install_ffmpeg.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/create_river.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/river_drawing.py', 'Atlas/code_files/ai_code.py', 'Atlas/code_files/automate_task.py', 'Atlas/code_files/average.py', 'Atlas/code_files/test_average.py', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_features.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/clockify_info.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/featured_article.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/file_logger.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/legal_research_resources.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/new_file.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/pumble_features.txt', 'Atlas/text_files/pumble_pricing.txt', 'Atlas/misc_files/<filename>', 'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.json']", type='action_result')]
"""
